description:
When search returns no results, analyze the query and provide specific suggestions: check spelling, try broader terms, remove filters, or search within specific entity types. Show similar successful searches from workspace history.

**Rationale:** Failed searches create frustration and dead ends. Intelligent empty states turn failures into learning moments and help users discover search capabilities (full-text, entity-specific) they may not know exist.
title: Search Results Empty State with Query Refinement Tips
